name: Workshop Elves
description:
WORKSHOP ELVES

It is the last night before Christmas! Time to send out the last presents.

Judge the kids on their deeds based on the rules stated in the Hall of Commandments.

 Then get either an approval or disapproval document using their wishlist.

Lastly trade the document against the present or coal and send it out.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move and the mouse to look around.
Use the left mouse-button to Pick Up, Drop or interact with objects.
Escape pauses the game.

GAMEJAM

This game was made for the Extra Credits Holiday Jam 2018 with the topic "Present". I think the scope for the game we picked ended up being too big, but I am still happy with the outcome. There is still a lot of polishing to do, and there is barely any sound.
